thread.title: Islip cites urgent need for new ambulance facility
thread.title_full: Islip cites urgent need for new ambulance facility | Newsday

author: Sophia Chang
title: Islip cites urgent need for new ambulance facility
text:
A new $6.5 million, 15,500-square-foot facility is planned for the Exchange Ambulance of the Islips. Feb. 18, 2017 (Credit: Ed Betz) 

A new $6.5 million, 15,500-square-foot facility for the Exchange Ambulance of the Islips has drawn some criticism from a resident, who is campaigning for the building to be renovated instead for less money.
The Town of Islip owns the building on Carleton Avenue in East Islip where the ambulance exchange is headquartered. In November, the town board narrowly approved its $45.7 million capital...
